com.flowpowered.caustic.api.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Model>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StringModel

    public class Model
extends Object
implements Comparable<Model>
    Represents a model. Each model has it's own position and rotation and set of uniforms. The vertex array provides the vertex data (mesh), while the material provides uniforms and textures for the shader.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Model()
      An empty constructor for child classes only.

      Constructs a new model from the provided one.

      Constructs a new model from the vertex array and material.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        protected Model()
        An empty constructor for child classes only.

      • Model

        protected Model(Model model)
        Constructs a new model from the provided one. The vertex array and material are reused. No information is copied.
        Parameters:
        model - The model to derive this one from

      • Model

        public Model(VertexArray vertexArray,
             Material material)
        Constructs a new model from the vertex array and material.
        Parameters:
        vertexArray - The vertex array
        material - The material

      • getInstance

        public Model getInstance()
        Returns an instance of this model. The model shares the same vertex array and material as the original one, but different position information and uniform holder.
        Returns:
        The instanced model

      • getUniforms

        public UniformHolder getUniforms()
        Returns the model's uniforms
        Returns:
        The uniforms

      • getParent

        public Model getParent()
        Returns the parent model. This model's position, rotation and scale are relative to that model if not null.
        Returns:
        The parent model, can be null for no parent

      • setParent

        public void setParent(Model parent)
        Sets the parent model. This model's position, rotation and scale will be relative to that model if not null.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent model, or null for no parent
